ComicInfo.Penciller: Nick Cardy,Ruben Moreira,Will Ely,Nick Cardy,Bill Ely,Bernard Baily,Ruben Moreira,Henry Boltinoff
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Earth Gladiator: Aliens will take possession of Earth unless John Trent can defeat their champion in a game of survival. Though out-gunned, Trent uses his wits to protect the world.
The Remarkable Mr. Multiplier: Thad Merkel invents a machine to mass-produce copies of things like cars and planes, but the machine seems to have a childlike mind of its own. This playfulness helps the inventor stop a group of thieves, but the idea of a self-aware machine is too dangerous, and Merkel destroys its master circuit.
I Was Marooned on Planet Earth: A Saturnian is accidentally rocketed to Earth where he must find a source of radium in order to return home.
You Stole Our Planet: Working on a way to create a barrier against nuclear fallout, two scientists are visited by creatures accusing humans of having stolen their world. Eventually the creatures realize they are not on their planet and the scientists reverse their experiment, sending the creatures back to their universe.
ComicInfo.Title: The Earth Gladiator; The Remarkable Mr. Multiplier; I Was Marooned on Planet Earth; You Stole Our Planet
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
